revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Col. III: "Pa . . ., son of Sisois, in the 21st year 45 drachmas 2 obols, 20th year 45 drachmas [2 obols], in the 19th year 45 drachmas and 2 obols, for dike-tax 13 drachmas 2 obols, . . . {Remaining part of col. III is P. Princ. I 11]." ;Col. IV: "And in the metropolis Nekpheros, son of Armiysis, dike-tax 13 drachmas 2 obols.";Col. V: "And in Babylon, Nekthatymis, son of Petenes, in the 21st year, 45 drachmas 2 obols, 20th year 45 drachmas two obols, dike-tax 13 drachmas 2 obols.";Col. VI: "Man for man of those in Alexandria and Juliopolis and Parembole, Horos likewise son of Harpas 21st year 45 drachmas 2 obols, 20th year 45 drachmas 2 obols, 19th year 45 drachmas 2 obols, dike-tax 13 drachmas 2 obols. Saras, son of Antis, 21st year 45 drachmas 2 obols, 20th year 45 drachmas 2 obols, dike-tax 13 drachmas 2 obols."

listBibl.bibl: Hanson A E, ZPE 37, 244-245, 1980 -- SB XVI, 12632
